verbs.description: Republican Rep. Michael Burgess [V: was] confronted by constituents in a town hall meeting in his North Texas district Monday about the Trump administration ’s policy of separating child migrants from their parents at the border .

[ARG1: Republican Rep. Michael Burgess] was [V: confronted] [ARG0: by constituents] [ARGM-LOC: in a town hall meeting in his North Texas district] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] [ARG2: about the Trump administration ’s policy of separating child migrants from their parents at the border] .

Republican Rep. Michael Burgess was confronted by constituents in a town hall meeting in his North Texas district Monday about the Trump administration ’s policy of [V: separating] [ARG1: child migrants] [ARG2: from their parents] [ARGM-LOC: at the border] .
